pkgmetadata.longdescription: `ryvencore-qt` provides Qt-based GUI classes for ryvencore, and is itself a Python package. The Ryven editor is built on top of `ryvencore-qt`. `ryvencore-qt` uses the PySide2 Python bindings for Qt. It shouldn't be too much work to get it running with PySide6 but I didn't try it yet. PyQt is not supported (because it doesn't allow for multi-inheritance on QObject derived classes).### Installation```pip install ryvencore-qt```or build from sources```git clone https://github.com/leon-thomm/ryvencd ryven/ryvencore-qtpip install .```
